ëˆˆë³´ë¼ë‚œ ë„ˆë¥¼ ì‹ ê²½ ì“°ì§€ ì•Šì•„
ì™„ì „ ì—‰ë§ì´ì˜ˆìš”. ì§„ì§œ ì—‰ë§ì´ì˜ˆìš”. ì´ë ‡ê²Œ ì“°ë ˆê¸° ê°™ì€ ê²Œì„ì„ í•´ë³¸ ì ì´ ì—†ì–´ìš”

Although I will be trying whatever is left of the PvE can't say I will pick the game back up at this current time, what at first was a good idea to remove 1 tank turned into a unfun game of punching bag where if your the tank, your the punching bag.

DPS has the most variety but that's because they are 75% of the roster.

Support is as fun as DPS with the down side of having not many to choose from making the role stale after a while.

The battle pass does little to excite me outside of the mythics skin most of the time, with many cosmetics being horribly over priced ranging from 10-20 bucks for 1 skin which sucks if the cool skin you like turns out to be 20 bucks.

Balance changes are back and forth half the time being changes that aren't all that impactful to changes that are so out of left field they get reverted or overly nerfed next patch.

As a tank main I simply refuse to really pick the game back up due to either not having fun relying on my team to do things to constantly being called out for being bad (skill issue) and outside of giving the PvE a shot (review been made before trying it out) I don't know if I will ever fully play the game again.


Also blizzard bad, there I said it.

I think Overwatch 2 is a boring game because it lacks originality and innovation. It is basically a rehash of the first game with some minor changes and updates. The gameplay is repetitive and predictable, the characters are bland and uninteresting, and the story is shallow and clichÃ©. Overwatch 2 does not offer anything new or exciting to the players, and it feels like a cash grab by the developers. I would not recommend this game to anyone who is looking for a fun and engaging experience.

ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.
